Package game.actors

Class NPC

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.NPC
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ally, Enemy
public class NPC extends Actor

NPC

NPC parent class that represents the generally non playable characters in the game that can take their turns using behaviours

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected Map<Integer,Behaviour>
    behaviours
    Hash table to store possible behaviours Enemy can have, the lower the integer the key the higher the priority

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      At each turn, select a valid action to perform based on behaviours
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found

    • getSpecialAttack

      public Action getSpecialAttack()
      Method that can be overriden in enemies that have an intrinsic special attack and not from a weapon, if none then default returns null

    • hasWeapon

      public boolean hasWeapon()
      Checks if the npc has at least one weapon or none
